QuestData.Title: Haohan's Vote IV: Melons For Felons
QuestData.Description: All right, now I happen to know that those mountain hozen love a delicious, sweet melon.$B$BMr. Haohan's last harvest of melons got stolen, so we're going to have to grow some of our own.$B$BOnce we have our harvest, we'll use them to lure the nasty hozen's leader out of its cave!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant and harvest 4 Striped Melons, then deliver 20 Striped Melons to Farmer Yoon.$B$BStriped Melon Seeds can be purchased from Merchant Greenfield at Halfhill Market. After tilling and tending your plant, you must wait until the next day to harvest ripe Striped Melons.
